explains: n. [解剖] 神经元，神经单位

sentences.en: What does the new research in the magazine Neuron suggest?
sentences.cn: 《神经元》杂志上的新研究表明了什么？

sentences.en: Adenosine normally depresses neuron firing in many areas of the brain.
sentences.cn: 腺苷通常会抑制大脑许多区域的神经元活动。

sentences.en: Like many other agents that affect neuron firing, adenosine must first bind to specific receptors on neuronal membranes.
sentences.cn: 像许多其他影响神经元放电的物质一样，腺苷必须首先与神经元膜上的特定受体结合。
